item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 17th April 2018 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: It’s time for another devops meetup at the ODI Node in Leeds on Tuesday 17th April. The evening will be: 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:25 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:25 - 8:05 : Look Ma, no Code! Apache Kafka and KSQL 8:05 - 8:20 : Intermission 8:20 - 9:00 : Ansible Enterprise Grade 9:00 - late : Decamp to the Wardrobe

item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 27th February 2018 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: Happy new year! it’s time for the first devops get together of 2018 at the ODI Node in Leeds on Tuesday 27th February. We have a fantastic duo of talks for you: 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:25 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:25 - 8:05 : Building Pipelines with Kafka from Scratch - Ben Abramson and Robert Knowles of William Hill
